definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Concentrate on their faces and it's like watching furry handymen changing a plug.
sentences.chinese: 看它們的臉就像是個幹雜活的在換插頭。

sentences.english: The unit shall be equipped with a standard 120V plug-in cord.
sentences.chinese: 這種熱水器應該配置一個標準的120伏插頭電纜。

sentences.english: Unplug the TV before you go to bed.
sentences.chinese: 睡前將電視機的插頭拔下來。

sentences.english: Fouth, remember pull up the Battery plug after use.
sentences.chinese: 其四，電褥子使用完後要拔掉電源插頭。

sentences.english: A fault test system for flat cables is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種扁平電纜線壓接插頭後的故障測試系統。

sentences.english: Attach test leads to pins 1 and 2 and note ohmmeter reading.
sentences.chinese: 把測試探針連接到插頭1和2，並記下歐姆表讀數。

sentences.english: I need an adaptor for a three-pin plug.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個三腳插頭的轉接頭。

sentences.english: Lastly, the Euro plug which is also used throughout continental Europe.
sentences.chinese: 最後，歐標插頭也可用於整個歐洲大陸。

sentences.english: Please cut off the power and unplug the reefers before discharging.
sentences.chinese: 卸貨前請切斷電源，拔下冷藏箱的插頭。

sentences.english: This eliminates the need for an external loopback plug.
sentences.chinese: 不再需要使用外部回送連接插頭。

sentences.english: Do not touch the wet hand with power plugs.
sentences.chinese: 請勿用沾溼的手拔電源線插頭。

sentences.english: Good , I 've get a two-pin plug.
sentences.chinese: 好，我有一個兩腳插頭的。

sentences.english: Look at the plugs and lights in every room.
sentences.chinese: 看各個房間電器插頭和燈。

sentences.english: Each cable has a pair of wires and two connectors.
sentences.chinese: 每根線纜，有一對線和兩個插頭。

sentences.english: Check that the plug has been wired up properly.
The unit shall be equipped with a standard120 V plug-in cord.
sentences.chinese: 這種熱水爐應該配置一個標準的120伏插頭電纜。

definition: Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents/Taiwan Compatriot Entry Permit/abbr. for 台灣居民來往大陸通行證|台湾居民来往大陆通行证[Tai2 wan1 Ju1 min2 Lai2 wang3 Da4 lu4 Tong1 xing2 zheng4]
